42726984220859.name: Cinnamon Swirl Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb
42726984220859.desc: If you have never tried cinnamon salt water taffy then you don't know what you are missing out on. The flavor of these is perfect. They have a cinnamon blend that is spicy and works just right with the sweet flavor that they have as well. There is nothing better than the tasty of salt water taffy and when you combine it with cinnamon the flavor really seems to explode. The candies are pink in color and are sure to look great for a many different occasions. You will also like to know that each piece is wrapped individually which is very helpful in making sure that they stay fresh as long as possible. There is just something about the chewy texture of taffy that is able to please so many people. This is a great tasting candy with a great texture that is hard to beat.

42726983729339.name: Cinnamon Roll Taffy Town Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb
42726983729339.desc: Hold the phone. This Cinnamon Roll Salt Water Taffy cannot be real! It's just too delicious to be true. However, don't pinch us if we're dreaming because we love the taste of these sweet and sugary Cinnamon Roll Salt Water Taffies that we don't want to be interrupted from enjoying their intense flavor.If you're a fan of this famous breakfast food, then try it in taffy form. Adding that soft chew to the warm and buttery Cinnamon Roll flavor to Salt Water Taffy makes it the most delicious and decadent treat. Serve some of these at your next family brunch or on the dessert platter alongside coffee and tea.

42726931071163.name: Cinnamon Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726931071163.desc: With the charm of an old barbershop pole, the spicy sweetness of cinnamon, and a hard candy crunch this old fashioned stick has it all. You can satisfy a spicy and sweet craving, stir them into a cup of hot cocoa or hot mulled cider for a unique twist, and even use them as an adorable decoration on a gingerbread house! There are just so many possibilities. And with 8 sticks in every package, there are enough to do it all. These classic sticks have been around for generations and still have the gusto to wow your friends and family.

42688757563579.name: Fire Cube Cinnamon Suckers Tub - 100ct
42688757563579.desc: Old fashioned cinnamon Cube Pops are a unique confection that harkens back to simpler times. There's something warm and cozy about the taste of traditional cinnamon. Each Cube Pop includes a disposable stick with a 3D square shaped hard candy on top. Each bright red piece is filled with classic cinnamon flavor that's sure to satisfy sweet cravings with a touch of nostalgia. They arrive individually wrapped, making Cube Pops a great choice for party favors and more.

42688740425915.name: Cinnamon Gummy Bears - 5lb
42688740425915.desc: Get your cinnamon fix with our delicious gummy bears! Each piece offers serious cinnamon flavor with a look that's sure to entice. Just like traditional gummy bears, these handsome teddy's have a large head with round ears, adorable paws and an endearing face. Every piece is made of solid gummy candy in a bright red hue that grabs attention and hints at the irresistible flavor that awaits! Take a bite and enjoy your favorite soft candy with a touch of warm spice! Our bulk cinnamon bears are a must-have for events, holidays and parties!Combine with a green candy to create a festive Christmas mix or surprise guests by mixing with other gummy bears in a candy dish. We carry a variety of other single color candies so you can build a custom assortment for any event. Make beautiful wedding favors with a red theme or spice up your birthday party treat bags with our bulk cinnamon bears!

42688422412475.name: Cinnamon Toothpicks Hotlix - 20ct
42688422412475.desc: Nothing tops off a good meal like Cinnamon Toothpix to clean your teeth! Sit back, relax, and freshen your breath with these cinnamon flavored sticks. The are infused with real cinnamon oil!They are a great, flavorful tool to keep around the house for guests, to keep in your purse if you need one, or just to chew on if you love the cinnamony flavor! In reusable tubes, these pointy picks can be stored safely without worry of poking yourself or others. And when you're done, you can use the tube again to store some more! Bring some of these home today to help you attain a cleaner mouth and enjoy a taste of spicy cinnamon every time you use them.

42688438141115.name: Hot Tamales Theater Boxes - 12ct
42688438141115.desc: We were just talking about Hot Tamales Theater Boxes and how much heat they'll pack into our next trip to the movies. Also amazing for when you lay down on the couch to watch a feature film. So good!If you love spicy cinnamon heat, then you'll love stocking up with this bulk supply of Hot Tamales movie size boxes. If you're going to have a viewing party with friends, spice up the night with some of these for guests to munch on. Even bring Hot Tamales Theater Boxes home to stuff into gift baskets or give away at a raffle. Whatever you do, remember these candies are hot, hot, hot!

42688339869883.name: Red Hots Theater Boxes - 12ct
42688339869883.desc: Red Hots candy are a traditional treat that packs a powerful punch of fiery flavor! This nostalgic treat is full of cinnamon for a snacking experience that sizzles. This is one confection that's not intended for the weak of heart (or the weak of taste bud!). Each piece includes a dainty round morsel in bright red. Try just one or test your mettle by grabbing a handful and letting them all smother your tongue with intense cinnamon taste! The Red Hots we know and love today have been around for a very long time. This treat was introduced by the Ferrara Pan Company during the 1930s. Their popularity has grown tremendously since then. Red Hots are a popular choice for use as a decoration for cakes, cookies or homemade candies. They are even used in apple sauce recipes! Our bulk Red Hots package contains many theater boxes that are perfect for holidays, events or family movie night.

42688430047419.name: Unbearably Hot Cinnamon Gummi Bears Jelly Belly - 10lb Bulk
42688430047419.desc: If you love the taste of cinnamon and the chewy texture of gummies, you should be hoarding these hot cinnamon gummy bears stat! As they come in a bright red color, they definitely make for the best holiday treats. Whether you plan to play Santa or not, there's absolutely no doubt you'd be spreading the holiday cheer with these little guys!Plus, not only do these Hot Cinnamon Gummi Bears make for the best stocking stuffers during the Christmas season, they also work well for any kind of occasion - be it a Sweet 16 Birthday Party, an office mixer or a themed ladies' only bachelorette celebration. Truth is - you don't need any occasion to brighten up someone's day with these cinnamon-flavored goodies. So, delight all your loved ones with these Hot Cinnamon Gummi Bears and make every day feel like a holiday!

42688984842427.name: Reed's Cinnamon Rolls Hard Candy Rolls - 24ct
42688984842427.desc: Bringing you authentic cinnamon candy since 1893! Hard candy rolls from Reed's are rich in flavor and big on nostalgia.

42690293727419.name: Atomic Fireballs Clear Window Peg Bags - 12ct
42690293727419.desc: Atomic Fireballs Clear Window Peg Bags 4.75oz - 12ct

42726908788923.name: Sizzling Cinnamon Jelly Belly Jelly Beans - 10lb Bulk
42726908788923.desc: Danger, danger! These Sizzling Cinnamon Jelly Belly Jelly Beans should come with caution tape! That's because they're packing some serious heat in every little bean! If you love cinnamon flavored candy with a big bite, then try these sizzling jelly beans.In a beautiful red shell complete with orange speckles, these red hot beans also do some damage on the eye balls with their bold brightness. If you're getting ready for Christmas and want a thematic red treat but with a serious dose of holiday spice, then try these Jelly Belly Sizzling Cinnamon Jelly Beans. They're spark conversation, light up the night and ignite more fun every time you take a bite.
